Now, let's structure the Fortran code step by step. First, declare variables:

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n
    integer(8) :: ans, i, term
    character(len=20) :: str_ans
    character(len=1) :: first_char, new_char
    integer :: oddCount, count

    !
children.label: high_level_plan

children.text:
Read input
    read(*,*) n

    ! Compute ans (first program)
    ans = 0_8
    do i = 1, n
        term = i * (n / i) * ( (n/i) + 1 ) / 2
        ans = ans + term
    end do

    ! Convert ans to string and process second step
    write(str_ans, '(i0)') ans
    first_char = str_ans(1:1)
    new_char = char(ichar(first_char) + 1)

    ! Process third step
    ! The input string is new_char (length 1)
    count = 1  ! since it's one character
    if (count ==1) then
        oddCount = 1
    else
        oddCount =0
    end if

    ! Determine output
    if (oddCount <=1 .or. mod(oddCount,2) /=0) then
        print *, "First"
    else
        print *, "Second"
    end if

end program main

Now, let's structure the Fortran code step by step.

First, declare variables:

program main

    implicit none

    integer :: n
    integer(8) :: ans, i, term
    character(len=20) :: str_ans
    character(len=1) :: first_char, new_char
    integer :: oddCount, count

    ! Read input
    read(*,*) n

    ! Compute ans (first program)
    ans = 0_8
    do i = 1, n
        term = i * (n / i) * ( (n/i) + 1 ) / 2
        ans = ans + term
    end do

    ! Convert ans to string and process second step
    write(str_ans, '(i0)') ans
    first_char = str_ans(1:1)
    new_char = char(ichar(first_char) + 1)

    ! Process third step
    ! The input string is new_char (length 1)
    count = 1  ! since it's one character
    if (count ==1) then
        oddCount = 1
    else
        oddCount =0
    end if

    ! Determine output
    if (oddCount <=1 .or. mod(oddCount,2) /=0) then
        print *, "First"
    else
        print *, "Second"
    end if

end program main
